Class ImageGenerationRequest

Represents a request to the Images API. Mostly matches the parameters in the OpenAI docs, although some have been renamed or expanded into single/multiple properties for ease of use.

ImageGenerationRequest()

Cretes a new, empty ImageGenerationRequest

Declaration
public ImageGenerationRequest()
| Improve this Doc View Source

ImageGenerationRequest(String, Model, ImageSize, String, String, ImageResponseFormat)

Creates a new ImageGenerationRequest with the specified parameters

Declaration
public ImageGenerationRequest(string prompt, Model model, ImageSize size = null, string quality = "standard", string user = null, ImageResponseFormat responseFormat = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String prompt

A text description of the desired image(s). The maximum length is 1000 characters.
Model model

The model to use for this request. Defaults to DALL-E 2.
ImageSize size

The size of the generated images. Must be one of 256x256, 512x512, or 1024x1024.
System.String quality

By default, images are generated at standard quality, but when using DALL·E 3 you can set quality to hd for enhanced detail.
System.String user

A unique identifier representing your end-user, which can help OpenAI to monitor and detect abuse.
ImageResponseFormat responseFormat

The format in which the generated images are returned. Must be one of url or b64_json.
| Improve this Doc View Source

ImageGenerationRequest(String, Nullable<Int32>, ImageSize, String, ImageResponseFormat)

Creates a new ImageGenerationRequest with the specified parameters

Declaration
public ImageGenerationRequest(string prompt, int? numOfImages = 1, ImageSize size = null, string user = null, ImageResponseFormat responseFormat = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String prompt

A text description of the desired image(s). The maximum length is 1000 characters.
System.Nullable<System.Int32> numOfImages

How many different choices to request for each prompt. Defaults to 1.
ImageSize size

The size of the generated images. Must be one of 256x256, 512x512, or 1024x1024.
System.String user

A unique identifier representing your end-user, which can help OpenAI to monitor and detect abuse.
ImageResponseFormat responseFormat

The format in which the generated images are returned. Must be one of url or b64_json.

NumOfImages

How many different choices to request for each prompt. Defaults to 1. Only for DALL-E 2. For DALL-E 3, only 1 is allowed.

Declaration
[JsonProperty("n")]
public int? NumOfImages { get; set; }

| Improve this Doc View Source

Quality

By default, images are generated at standard quality, but when using DALL·E 3 you can set quality to hd for enhanced detail. Square, standard quality images are the fastest to generate.

Declaration
[JsonProperty("quality", NullValueHandling = NullValueHandling.Ignore)]
public string Quality { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

ResponseFormat

The format in which the generated images are returned. Must be one of url or b64_json. Defaults to Url.
